wikitext.*:
'''''Vinge''''' is a noun meaning "foam" or "spray" in [[Quenya]], derived from [[Primitive Quendian|Primitive Elvish]] '''''wingē'''''<ref name=":0">{{Cite web|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1261033287.html?neo|articlename=Eldamo: "vingë"|author=Paul Strack|accessed=30/10/24}}</ref>''.'' Tolkien vacillated greatly on the form of this word, and so it is also found as '''''winga'', ''vinga'',''' and '''''winge,''''' and with stem form '''''vingi-''.'''<ref name=":0" />  It is cognates with ''[[gwing]]'' in [[Sindarin]].<ref name=":0" />

Example:
*[[Vingilótë]] = "Foam-flower"

{{references}}
*''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' by [[Ruth S. Noel]]
*[http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm Quenya Corpus Wordlist] edited by [[Helge Fauskanger]]
